sen.j: 小久保清吉（こくぼ せいきち、弘化4年（1847年） - 明治元年10月24日 (旧暦)（1868年12月7日））は、幕末期の唐津藩士。
sen.e: Seikichi Kokubo (1847 - December 7, 1868 was a feudal retainer of the Karatsu clan in the end of Edo period.
Seikichi KOKUBO (1847 - December 7, 1868 was a feudal retainer of the Karatsu clan in the end of Edo period.
sen.cmt: Kokubo を大文字に変更しました。
sen.e: Seikichi KOKUBO (1847 - December 7, 1868 was a feudal retainer of the Karatsu clan in the end of Edo period.
Later, he joined Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).
Later, he joined Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).
sen.cmt: joined の前のスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: Later, he joined Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).

sen.j: 姓は小窪とも表記する。
sen.e: His family name is usually spelled 小久保, and also 小窪.
His family name is usually spelled 小久保, and also 小窪.
His family name is usually spelled 小久保, and also 小窪.

sen.j: 唐津藩士小久保弥吉の長男に生まれる。
sen.e: He was born as the first son of Yakichi KOKUBO, a feudal retainer of the Karatsu clan.
He was born as the first son of Yakichi KOKUBO, a feudal retainer of the Karatsu clan.
He was born as the first son of Yakichi KOKUBO, a feudal retainer of the Karatsu clan.

sen.j: 戊辰戦争時、藩主小笠原長行が榎本武揚らと同意して蝦夷地渡航を決意したため、土方歳三配下の新選組に入隊して共に蝦夷地へ渡る。
sen.e: During the Boshin War, because the lord of the domain Nagamichi OGASAWARA agreed to go to Ezo with Takeaki ENOMOTO, he joined Shinsengumi under control of Toshizo HIJIKATA and went to Ezo with him.
During the Boshin War, because the lord of the domain Nagamichi OGASAWARA agreed to go to Ezo with Takeaki ENOMOTO, he joined Shinsengumi under control of Toshizo HIJIKATA and went to Ezo with him.
During the Boshin War, because the lord of the domain Nagamichi OGASAWARA agreed to go to Ezo with Takeaki ENOMOTO, he joined Shinsengumi under control of Toshizo HIJIKATA and went to Ezo with him.

sen.j: 箱館戦争初期の峠下の戦いで三好胖（小笠原胖之助。長行の弟）が討たれたため、敵を追跡したが、途中、胸に敵弾を受けて戦死した。
sen.e: In the Battle of Togeshita in the early stage of Hakodate War, he tracked the enemy who killed Yutaka MIYOSHI (Hannosuke OGASAWARA, younger brother of Nagamishi), but was hit in the chest by the enemy and killed on the way.
sen.cmt: ()内で分割されていたので、こちらにまとめました。
sen.e: In the Battle of Togeshita in the early stage of Hakodate War, he tracked the enemy who killed Yutaka MIYOSHI (Hannosuke OGASAWARA, younger brother of Nagamichi), but was hit in the chest by the enemy and killed on the way.

In the Battle of Togeshita in the early stage of Hakodate War, he tracked the enemy who killed Yutaka MIYOSHI (Hannosuke OGASAWARA, younger brother of Nagamichi), but was hit in the chest by the enemy and killed on the way.
Died at 22.
Died at 22.
Died at 22.
